SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.bill_date, '%Y') as year, count(1) as totalQty, sum(a.entry_amount) as entryAmount, sum(a.discount_amount) as discountAmount, sum(a.final_amount) as finalAmount, sum(a.total_amount) as totalAmount, sum(a.payment_amount) as paymentAmount, sum(a.cost_amount) as costAmount, sum(a.`total_amount` - a.`payment_amount`) AS debtAmount, sum(a.`payment_amount` - a.`cost_amount`) AS netAmount, sum(a.`total_amount` - a.`cost_amount`) AS profitAmount FROM se_order a
and bill_date >= #{param.start} and bill_date <= #{param.end}
and audit_status = 'YES' and a.total_amount - a.cost_amount > 0
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.bill_date, '%Y')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.bill_date, '%Y-%m') as year, count(1) as billCount, sum(a.total_qty) as totalQty, sum(a.total_amount) as totalAmount, sum(a.payment_amount) as paymentAmount, sum(a.cost_amount) as costAmount, sum(a.`total_amount` - a.`payment_amount`) AS debtAmount, sum(a.`payment_amount` - a.`cost_amount`) AS netAmount, sum(a.`total_amount` - a.`cost_amount`) AS profitAmount FROM se_order a
and bill_date >= #{param.start} and bill_date <= #{param.end}
and audit_status = 'YES' and a.total_amount - a.cost_amount > 0
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.bill_date, '%Y-%m')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.trade_time, '%Y') as year, account, cost_type as costType, sum(pay_amount) as payAmount FROM cashier_record a
and trade_time >= #{param.start} and trade_time <= #{param.end}
and cost_type != '/' and pay_status not like '%退%'
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.trade_time, '%Y'), account, cost_type
